definition[0]: to leave a place or person
example[0]: Go away and leave me alone!
example[1]: I went away wondering if I’d said the wrong thing.
definition[1]: to travel to a place and spend some time there, for example for a holiday
example[2]: Are you going away this year?
example[3]: We’re going away for the weekend.
example[4]: He’s going away to college next year.
example[5]: I’m going away on a business trip next week.
definition[2]: if a problem, unpleasant feeling etc goes away, it disappears
example[6]: Ignoring the crime problem won’t make it go away.
